p: For the quantification of the phytochemical marker d‐limonene in lime oil the Applicant submitted a GC‐FID method based on the corresponding standard ISO 3519:2005 for the characterisation of the ‘oil of lime distilled, Mexican type (Citrus aurantifolia [Christm.] Swingle)’. The quantification is performed using the normalisation approach for the estimation of the area percentage of individual components. The Applicant presented a chromatogram and the specific analytical procedure for the analysis of d‐limonene in lime oil.
